Title: This 3D video shows how quickly coronavirus can attack a healthy person’s lungs - The Indian Express
Description: The scan shows that the damage isn't localised to a single area and has fanned out to both the lungs, showing how quickly the infection can spread even in younger patients.

Title: Prominent Indian-origin virologist in South Africa dies from coronavirus - Hindustan Times
Description: Gita Ramjee, 64, was the Clinical Trials Unit Principal Investigator and Unit Director of the HIV Prevention Research Unit of the South African Medical Research Council (SAMRC) offices in Durban.

Title: Coronavirus: Should you wear mask in public if not sick? - India Today
Description: There is "no specific evidence to suggest that the wearing of masks by the mass population has any particular benefit", the WHO's epidemics chief said this week. "In fact, there’s some evidence to suggest the opposite."

Title: Coronavirus lockdown: Man has dance-off with granddaughter across the street. Internet loves viral video - India Today
Description: An adorable video of a man having a dance-off with his granddaughter across the street has gone viral on the internet.

Title: Astrophysicist Ends Up In Hospital After Coronavirus Invention Goes Wrong - Trendinindia
Description: A scientist ended up on the hospital after an invention gone fallacious (Representative Image) An Australian astrophysicist hoping to create a necklace that might stop folks from touching their faces as an alternative ended up within the hospital after the tr…

Title: Coronavirus: Indian government’s MyGov app has some myth-busters for you - Hindustan Times
Description: The Indian government’s MyGov app is doing its bit in fighting fake news and misinformation on coronavirus by stating some ‘myth-busters’.
